title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select a label item for the first time in the library outline view, it does not get selected.
EB: The label item should be selectable the first time it is clicked in the library outline view.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Select the added label item.
